Text:
Do you have your 9 year old wife with you?

Oh no,silly me,she'll be sat behind a curtain somewhere with all the other hooded women :-(

Happy! Do you know that the incidence of nine years old getting pregnant is increasing-are of them happening in the West. Not a single case in the muslim countries.  Two reasons for that 

1) Muslims take great care of their women folks. Yes brothers cousins and the community look after them and don't let them wonder around where they can be targeted by pedophiles or raped.

2)Alcoholic drinks are strictly forbidden in Islam, which makes it a very women and child friendly society.

Here in the US girls and women being brutally beaten and raped and even murdered by their drunk husbands and boyfriends is back page news. But the most heart wrenching news was the nine year old raped by her drunk father who became pregnant. No Western society is NOT women or child friendly.
